releases.summary: Introduced the Observability domain with labs covering metrics, logs, alerting, incident command, and decision-making under partial visibility.
Launched Core Pro with advanced CI/CD, governance, security, and reliability engineering labs beyond Foundation Core.
Released AIOps domain focusing on AI-assisted operations, agent reliability, governance, and human-in-the-loop decision making.
Introduced CloudOps domain covering real-world cloud architecture failures, resilience design, and operational decision making.
highlights: Permission sprawl and cloud blast radius analysis
